concept.title: Automatic Speech Recognition Client Utility Overview

conbody.p: This document provides an overview of the Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) Client Utility.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The ASR Client Utility provides speech recognition services.
The DLL that provides the functionality and the library to which your code must link is identified below.

entry.p: These files are used for implementing the ASR Client Utility.

section.title: Architectural Relationship
section.p: The ASR Client Utility provides the interface between clients and the Multimedia Framework. The ASR Client Utility uses ASR Custom Commands and ASR Data Handling to provide clients with speech recognition functionality.

section.title: Description
section.p: The ASR Client Utility provides speech recognition services for clients requiring speech recognition functionality.
